hillbillies.model.unit

Class Activity

  • java.lang.Object
    • hillbillies.model.unit.Activity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AttackActivity, FallActivity, MoveActivity, NoneActivity, RestActivity, WorkActivity

    abstract class Activity
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract base class for all activities, providing shared methods.
    Invariant:
    The unit must be valid & effective.
        this.getUnit() != null.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Activity(Unit unit)
      Initialize a new Activity from the given unit.

      Does the required work for this activity.

      Returns whether or not the unit may change Activities.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Activity

        Activity(Unit unit)
  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Initialize a new Activity from the given unit.
        Parameters:
        unit - The unit which will execute the activity.
        Postcondition:
        The unit will be set.
            new.getUnit() == unit
        Effect:
        Reset the activity.
            this.reset()
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the unit isn't effective. | unit == null

    • Method Detail

      • getUnit

        @Basic
 @Immutable
Unit getUnit()
        Returns the unit which will conduct the activity.

      • switchActivity

        void switchActivity(Activity newActivity)
        Switches the units activity.
        Parameters:
        newActivity - The new Activity the unit will execute.
        Effects:
      • If the unit has a tracker, and thus is executing a task, interrupt it.
            if (this.getUnit().hasTracker()) then (this.getUnit().interruptTask())
      • Reset The current activity if it isn't the same as the newActivity.
            if (newActivity != this.getUnit().getCurrentActivity())
            then (this.getUnit().getCurrentActivity().reset())
      • Set the unit's currentActivity to the newActivity.
            this.getUnit().setCurrentActivity(newActivity)

      • advanceTime

        @Model
abstract void advanceTime(double dt)
        Does the required work for this activity.
        Parameters:
        dt - Time since last frame.

      • canSwitch

        abstract boolean canSwitch()
        Returns whether or not the unit may change Activities.

      • reset

        @Raw
abstract void reset()
        Resets the activity when it was interrupted.
